PSCT.Base: Each of your opponent's monsters in the same column as one of your "S-Force" monsters can only target that monster for attacks. (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "S-Force" card from your hand; return this card to the hand, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "S-Force" monster from your Deck in Defense Position, except "S-Force Rappa Chiyomaru". You can only use this effect of "S-Force Rappa Chiyomaru" once per turn.
